cards.title: 简介
cards.body: [`just`](https://github.com/casey/just) 为您提供一种保存和运行项目特有命令的便捷方式

cards.title: 简单的 justfile
cards.code:
#!/usr/bin/env just --justfile

# hello 是配方(recipe)的名字
hello:
  echo "Hello World!"

cards.title: 带参数的配方
cards.code:
filter PATTERN:
   echo {{PATTERN}}

# 带有默认值的 param
email address='master@example.com':
   echo {{address}}

# 带表达式的参数
test triple=(arch() + "-unknown-unknown"):
  ./test {{triple}}

# 变量参数：“+”接受一个或多个值
backup +FILES:
  scp {{FILES}} me@example.com

# 带*的可变参数：零个或多个值
commit MESSAGE *FLAGS:
  git commit {{FLAGS}} -m "{{MESSAGE}}"

cards.title: 变量和子变量
cards.code:
version := "0.2.7"
tardir  := "awesomesauce-" + version
tarball := tardir + ".tar.gz"

test:
   echo {{version}}

# 仅从命令行设置/覆盖变量
$ just --set version 1.1.0

cards.title: 默认配置
cards.code:
default: lint build test
# 显示帮助信息的默认配方
default:
  @just --list
# 如果没有默认配方，则默认第一个配方

cards.title: 命令的环境变量
cards.code:
export RUST_BACKTRACE := "1"

test:
    # 如果堆栈崩溃，将打印堆栈跟踪
    cargo test

cards.title: backtick-从评估中捕获输出
cards.code:
JAVA_HOME := `jbang jdk home 11`
# Backtick 代码块
stuff := \```
   foo="hello"
   echo $foo "world"
\```

done BRANCH=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD`:
  git checkout master

sloc:
    @echo "`wc -l *.c` lines of code"

# Backtick 在任何地方工作：字符串/变量/参数

cards.title: 别名
cards.code:
alias t := test

cards.title: 带有命令 env 变量配置
cards.code:
# recipe 参数作为$符号的Env变量
hello $name:
   echo $name

cards.title: 设置
cards.code:
set shell := ["zsh", "-cu"] 

set dotenv-load := true
serv: 
   echo "$DATABASE_ADDRESS from .env"

set positional-arguments := true
foo:
  echo $0
  echo $1

cards.title: 配置依赖性-之前、之后和周围
cards.code:
# 执行序列：A-> B-> C-> D
b: a && c d
# 执行配方(recipe)“A”
b:
  echo 'B start!'
  just a
  echo 'B end!'
# 通过表达式依赖参数
default: (build "main")

build target:
  @echo 'Building {{target}}...'

cards.code:

   echo {{os()}}
   echo {{uppercase(name)}}

cards.title: 字符串-用双引号转义
cards.code:
tring-with-tab := "\t"
string-with-newline := "\n"
escapes := '\t\n\r\"\\'

# 该字符串将评估为`foo\nbar\n`
x := '''
  foo
  bar
'''

cards.title: 命令注释：quiet(@)、suppre­ss(-)、invert(!)
cards.code:
hello:
  @ echo "command will not be echoed"
  - echo "ignore none-zero exit status and continue"

@hello2:
  echo "command will not be echoed"

# 反转命令退出状态！- shell 功能
hello3:
  # 如果命令成功（退出状态为0），请仅退出
  ! git branch | grep '* master'

cards.title: 条件表达式：if、loop 和 while
cards.code:
# 正则表达匹配
fo := if "hi" =~ 'h.+' { "match" } else { "mismatch" }

test:
   if true; then echo 'True!'; fi
   for file in `ls .`; do echo $file; done
   while `server-is-dead`; do ping -c 1 server; done

foo bar:
  echo {{ if bar == "bar" { "hello" } else { "bye" } }}

cards.title: Just 命令行
cards.code:
# 运行配方(recipe)
$ just hello param1

# 按字母顺序列出配方(recipe)
$ just --list
$ just --summary

# 显示有关配方(recipe)的完整信息
just --show test

# 选择以交互方式运行的配方(recipe)
$ just --choose

# shell 完成
just --comp­letions zsh

cards.title: 其他语言的配置
cards.code:
bash-test:
    #!/usr/bin/env bash
    set -euxo pipefail
    hello='Yo'
    echo "$hello from bash!"

cards.title: 私人配置 - 名称以开头 _
注意
cards.code:
# 每个命令行都由一个新的 shell 执行
# 如果一个命令行执行失败，just会退出
# 后面的命令行不会执行
change-working-dir:
   cd bar && pwd
   # 多行构造 - 用斜线转义换行符
   if true; then \
        echo 'True!'; \
   fi

# justfile 不区分大小写：Justfile、JUSTFILE 等
# justfile 可以被隐藏：'.justfile'
# 从子目录调用配方：`~/app1/target>$ just build`

cards.title: 作为 shell 别名的配置
cards.code:
for recipe in `just -f ~/.justfile --summary`; do
  alias $recipe="just -f ~/.justfile -d. $recipe"
done
